Quick Summary: Diencephalic Syndrome is a rare neurological disorder caused by a tumor located in the diencephalon, an area of the brain that contains the thalamus and hypothalamus The hypothalamus controls the pituitary gland; and together they are responsible for a vast amount of hormonal control in the body
